quote: See, some people politely encourage their tone-deaf friends to sing. Some people even convince them to go on live television and audition for national competitions. But me? I am not that friend.
quote_letters: SEE SOME PEOPLE POLITELY ENCOURAGE THEIR TONE-DEAF FRIENDS TO SING SOME PEOPLE EVEN CONVINCE THEM TO GO ON LIVE TELEVISION AND AUDITION FOR NATIONAL COMPETITIONS BUT ME I AM NOT THAT FRIEND
